description:
Fair warning: don't be surprised if prana's North Loop Hooded Sweater ends up becoming your all-time grab-and-go layer. Made with Earth-friendly (and always comfortable) organic cotton, it's an easy choice for everyday outfitting.

With a modern slim fit that gives it an elevated look, just the right amount of warmth (without bulk), and a soft-to-the-touch texture that feels great each time to slip it on, they think this hooded sweater will quickly earn its keep in your closet.
name: Prana North Loop Hooded Sweater - Slim - Mens
